comment._content: Perry Belmont (1851-1947), US Congressman, minister to Spain: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Perry_Belmont Harriet B. Taggart Mack (d. 1954) was married to Norman Edward Mack (1858-1932), a Buffalo NY newspaperman who served as chairman of the Democratic National Committee in 1908; Harriet was also active with the party for decades, and served as a delegate to various national conventions. www.buffaloah.com/a/forestL/mack/index.html politicalgraveyard.com/families/13642.html
